anthos_dashboard_host_order_header_descr: You can customise your Anthos deployment by adding hosts to it. You will be redirected to a new page where you can confirm your order. The price displayed below is valid for a monthly subscription, with automatic renewal. You will be billed initially on a pro rata basis for the current month. If you subscribe for a longer period, you can get lower prices. To do this, please consult our sales team.
